infoArray.name: title
infoArray.desc: Title of content. It will display with small font.

infoArray.name: titleHint
infoArray.desc: Hint of title. It will display with lighter color and smaller font near the title.

infoArray.name: subTitle
infoArray.desc: Sub title of content. It will display with big font.

infoArray.name: content
infoArray.desc: Main content. It will display with small font.

infoArray.name: imgUrl
infoArray.desc: Image URL of content. It must be from a network path.
